dict.string: TrailGlass needs access to your location to show your position on the map and track your travels.
TrailGlass needs access to your location to track your travels, show your position on the map, and notify you when entering or leaving places you've marked.
TrailGlass needs access to your location in the background to automatically track your trips and notify you when entering or leaving places you've marked.
TrailGlass needs camera access to capture photos of places you visit during your travels.
TrailGlass needs access to your photo library to attach photos to your trips and places.
TrailGlass needs permission to save photos you capture during your trips.
TrailGlass sends notifications for trip updates, sync status, travel insights, and when you enter or leave places you've marked.
TrailGlass uses motion data to detect your activity type (walking, driving, cycling) during trips.
